Html:
Hi, when i try to build ALVARWrapper 1.3:

------ Build started: Project: ALVARWrapper1.3, Configuration: Release Win32 ------Linking...LINK : fatal error LNK1181: cannot open input file 'alvar130.lib'Build log was saved at "file://d:\Realite augmentée\GoblinXNA\wrappers\ALVARWrapper1.3\ALVARWrapper\Release\BuildLog.htm"ALVARWrapper1.3 - 1 error(s), 0 warning(s)========== Build: 0 succeeded, 1 failed, 0 up-to-date, 0 skipped ==========

 

I tried to add D:\Realite augmentée\Alvar 1.3.0\bin\msvc90 in the additionnal directories but the error are the same ;(

 

 

Thank and sorry for my bad english

Hi, has anyone the answer to this problem ?

I've encountered the same issue with the ALVAR Wrapper 1.3 and 1.4.

Thank you.

Ok, I've found.

Go in your project properties --> Configuration properties --> Linker --> General --> Additional Library directories

And change directories to match them with your install folders...
